rules_text:
[i]Sharp Fangs[/i] – Creatures you control have menace.
[i]Treasure Hunt[/i] – Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, create that many Treasure tokens.
[i]Moon's Howl[/i] – Creature cards in your graveyard have escape {B}{R}{G}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard.
